body: the scary thing is ichihaya originally planned to draw it as >imouto gets bitten >turns out shes pregnant as she turns into a zombie, kind of more messed up stuff, im glad this is relatively less mind fuck

realistic...
bruh my imouto get herself a bf DURING THE LOCKDOWN like how tf
She also said it's possible that they may never be able to go out anymore much like COVID rn.

For those who think his sister said something disturbing, she didn't They simply said they believed that their parents have already died.  The setting of the story is in a zombie apocalypse, and they're being lockdown. The brother tried to convince her to not have sex with him and that lockdown will soon be over, but they end up smashing anyways.

The ending is always much more attractive than the fxcking in ichihaya's works. 
but it actually surprised me when I realized that didn't see any twists in this one.
Ah thank god, you can never be sure with Ichihaya, the guy can make a fucked up plot twist in the end.

Basically the plot goes: sister brother are in lockdown due to zombie virus. Sis wants to experience love, but has no partner due to lockdown. So she chooses her brother, and her brother plays along, until she starts wanting to take a step further (sex). The brother is very reluctant, saying how after true lockdown is over she can meet other great people. But the sister says: “after the lockdown is over, all of this never happened, we will just pretend this never happened.” With this as the excuse and that “it’s a big brother’s responsibility to provide what his little sis wants”, they have sex. At the end of the sex page, the sis says all this pretending to be lovers has made her actually in love with her brother (wholesome!!). The bro knows deep down that they can never just pretend nothing happened and things will never be the same. Last few pages: the bro wonders when the lockdown will be over, in which the sis responds: it will never be over, but having her bro is enough for her.
I pray to god when this is translated it will be wholesome. Can never know with ichihaya
I dont understand this but Im pretty sure the loli said some disturbing shit in the ending just like all of ichihaya's other works
